name: Magician or Not?
description: You are Agent Blue, and you work for the POMA (Protection Of Magicians Association). It is your job to test possible mind-readers and report them to the POMA. Your next assignment is to test Zeke Mathers, a nineteen-year-old bartender. Maybe he is a magician, maybe he's just a good bartender.  Either way, it's about time you got paid to grab a few drinks at the bar.
